cards.name: Read Me
cards.rulesCode:
return `# üß† ChatGPT Interaction Board

This board lets you chat with ChatGPT using the OpenAI API.Follow these simple steps to get started:

## üîë Step 1: Get Your API Key

1. Go to[OpenAI's API Keys page](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys).
2. Log in and click ** "Create new secret key" **.
3. Copy and save your key securely ‚Äî it won't be shown again.

    > ‚ö†Ô∏è ** Keep it secret! ** Your API key is private and usage - based.

## üîë Step 2: Set Your API Key

1. Add your key on Key Setter card and click "+" to add. 

## üí¨ Step 3: Chat with ChatGPT

- Enter your message in the ** input box **.
- Click the ** "Send" ** button to interact.
- You‚Äôll receive a response from ChatGPT below.

Start chatting now and build your own AI assistant! üöÄ
`
